entry.title: Coinbase Rolls Out Ethereum Dapp Wallet
entry.summary: On May 16, Coinbase shared a wallet for its mobile app that lets customers access Ethereum-based dapps.

entry.title: Aurora+ To Offer 50 Free Monthly Transactions and Airdrop For Early Users
entry.summary: Aurora+, a Near Protocol EVM platform, offers 50 free transactions a month, a staking interface, airdrops and NFTs.

entry.title: UK Proposes Regulations That Would Recognize Stablecoins As A Form Of Payment
entry.summary: “Legislation to regulate stablecoins, where used as a means of payment, will be part of the Financial Services and Markets Bill which was announced in the Queen’s Speech,” a spokesman for Her Majesty’s Treasury told The Telegraph.

entry.title: Luna Foundation Guard Spent $3B In Unsuccessful Bid To Defend UST Peg
entry.summary: LFG burned through its Bitcoin reserves in an attempt to shore up UST. Some of its swaps are raising eyebrows.

entry.title: Will UST and LUNA Make It Back? Solutions for Terra
entry.summary: It’s Monday, time for a quick take on what’s happened since the apocalyptic events of last week. To recap. UST depegged, Terra’s supposedly blue chip ecosystem death spiraled leading to rampant inflation in the Luna token and catastrophic contagion throughout the entire crypto space.
